bill.title: Public Service Commission; may not regulate management or internal affairs of public utilities.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 77-1-33, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Clarify The Authority Of The Public Service Commission To Subpoena Witnesses; To Amend Section 77-3-3, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That A Public Utility's Internal Affairs, Governance Or Management Activities Are Not Subject To Regulation By The Public Service Commission; To Amend Section 77-3-5, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The Commission Shall Not Have Jurisdiction Over, Attempt To Regulate, Or Otherwise Interfere With The Governance, Management Or Other Internal Affairs Of Public Utilities; And For Related Purposes.
